code:
translate([0,0,2])
    scale([1,0.8,1])
    sphere(r=10,$fn=50);        // main body

/* Head */
translate([0,9,12])
    sphere(r=6,$fn=40);         // head sphere

/* Beak */
translate([0,15,12])
    rotate([0,20,0])
    scale([1.5,3,1])
    cylinder(h=5,r1=2,r2=0,$fn=20); // tapered beak

/* Eyes */
translate([2.5,11,14])
    sphere(r=1,$fn=10);         // right eye
translate([-2.5,11,14])
    sphere(r=1,$fn=10);         // left eye

/* Tail */
translate([-10,0,3])
    rotate([0,0,20])
    scale([0.5,1.2,0.3])
    sphere(r=6,$fn=30);         // tail tuft

/* Wing right */
translate([0,-5,7])
    rotate([0,0,-20])
    scale([1,0.4,0.7])
    sphere(r=8,$fn=30);         // right wing

/* Wing left */
translate([0,5,7])
    rotate([0,0,20])
    scale([1,0.4,0.7])
    sphere(r=8,$fn=30);         // left wing
